CatDescriptText: image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 8, 1941, pg. 10, reads: "Leading Figures in Repeat Performance of 'Aida' - Leading figures in repeat performance of 'Aida,' in Syria Mosque last Thursday evening. It was another artistic success...Lawrence Peeler (who played in the symphony orchestra)."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of violinist Lawrence Peeler, standing in Syria Mosque for National Negro Opera Company performance of "Aida"
